quote: Mom was adamantly pro-choice. She had a bumper sticker on the car that read If you can't trust me with a choice, how can you trust me with a child? But in her case the choice was to keep me.
quote_letters: MOM WAS ADAMANTLY PRO-CHOICE SHE HAD A BUMPER STICKER ON THE CAR THAT READ IF YOU CANT TRUST ME WITH A CHOICE HOW CAN YOU TRUST ME WITH A CHILD BUT IN HER CASE THE CHOICE WAS TO KEEP ME
